properties.address: St Swithin’s Church, The Paragon, Walcot, Bath, B&NES BA1 5LY
properties.description: A welcome warm space for everyone and there will be games and puzzles to engage all age groups. Welcoming warm space for all ages. Open on Tuesdays from 14th Feb 9.00-5:00 in the former Walcot Cafe accessible to all via the garden entrance of St Swithin’s Church. Waffles and other refreshments and drinks freely available. Games and puzzles too.
properties.title: Waffles on Walcot, St Swithin’s Church, Paragon, Bath.
